app-footer.description: An interoperability protocol for the next generation of multi-chain assets & identities

home-hero-section.subtitle: Decentralized social layer
home-hero-section.description: Bringing interoperability for identity and social components across multiple networks

marquee-section.marquee: THE NEXT CHAPTER OF INTERCONNECTED ASSETS & IDENTITIES

how-rarimo-works-section.title: Rarimo's modular architecture accelerates development of interoperable dApps and identities.
how-rarimo-works-section.subtitle: What is Rarimo?
how-rarimo-works-section.description: Protocol is based on Tendermint & Cosmos SDK and supports EVM-compatible smart contracts.
how-rarimo-works-section.easy-solutions-text: Transaction bundling allows multiple flows to be executed at once. Meaning fewer fees, signatures, and simplest experience for users.
how-rarimo-works-section.decentralized-network-text: Blockchain core and endless number of validators, no limit on the number of blockchains that can be connected.
how-rarimo-works-section.security-text: Threshold signatures ensure top-level security, and a constant transfer price guarantees affordability.

verticals-section.title: Verticals
verticals-section.assets-text: From Defi Lending, to NFT Checkouts, Rarimo makes multi-chain transactions easy and possible
verticals-section.identites-text: Cross-chain proofs for SBTs, Social Tokens, dynamic NFTs and more. For interoperable social graphs and identities

use-cases-section.title: Featured use cases
use-cases-section.nft-checkout-desc: With Rarimo, developers can build fully decentralized NFT checkouts with non-native tokens
use-cases-section.crosschain-proofs-desc: Verify the NFT / SBT ownership and easily retrieve the metadata stored on Rarimo
use-cases-section.multichain-minting-desc: Simplify the flow for airdropping and allow community to mint and hold tokens on their preferred chain

news-section.title: Latest news
news-section.second-title: What is Interoperability, and why is it so important?

subscribe-section.title: Subscribe to our newsletter
subscribe-section.description: Stay up-to-date about new features and supported apps

community-section.title: Start building with Rarimo
community-section.description: Our community is here to help! Enjoy support tailored to the unique needs of your project
community-section.support-desc: Make your engineering workflow more efficient
community-section.discord-desc: Connect with like-minded community for support and inspiration

nft-checkout-hero-section.title: NFT Checkout
nft-checkout-hero-section.description: Allow users to purchase NFTs with ANY crypto on any chain

advantages-section.single-signature: Single signature to execute the entire flow
advantages-section.merge-tokens: Merge multiple tokens for a single payment
advantages-section.gas-fee: Flexibility on gas fee payment options
advantages-section.best-price: Best Price discovery via Multiple DEX

implementation-section.description: The react component connects seamlessly with your Dapp or a Marketplace
implementation-section.acceptable-text: Define acceptable chain & token for the marketplace
implementation-section.transaction-building-text: Transaction building, wallet signs are handled by the component
implementation-section.testing-mode-text: Testing & debugging modes for local development
